skillTree.localised_description: Pugnacious and stubborn, the war beasts that pull these ramshackle chariots are grotesque combinations of great boar and mighty ram.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Those strong enough to tame the powerful, unruly Razorgors can harness them to chariots.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: He knows. Nobody knows how, but he does. He has always just known.
Chaos smiles upon them, granting unnatural and heretical defence against mortal machinations.
Hurling themselves into battle, a whirlwind of appendages and weapons strike, unexpected and deadly.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: The spellcaster unleashes the beast within, using its fury to transform allies into bestial forms.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: The spellcaster attunes the magic of the wild, channelling its ancient and arcane power.
With a mighty bellow, the caster invokes Corvus the Crow Lord, summoning his servants to peck at the foe's eyes.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Flock of Doom"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Calling upon the beast spirits of the wild, the caster sheathes vulnerable flesh in unyielding fur and hide.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Sounding a gnarled horn, the caster summons a glowing amber spear and hurls it at the foe with uncanny accuracy.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs single and multiple units
Requires line of sight to the target
Strong vs single and multiple units
Requires line of sight to the target
Strong vs single and multiple units
Requires line of sight to the target

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Amber Spear"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Amber Spear Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Amber Spear Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Nebulous nature spirits assail the foe, clawing at them with hands not nearly as insubstantial as they appear.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Curse of Anraheir"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Kadon, a master of forms, was able to shift his shape into anything he chose. This mastery is used to summon a Manticore, as if Kadon himself fights for you.

ui_effects.localised_text: Spawned unit fights in this battle only
Spawned unit fights in this battle only

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -6 for "Transformation of Kadon"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Spreads like fire!

effects.description:
Attrition: +10% casualties suffered from Chaos Undivided corruption and Chaos Wastes attrition
	(enemy armies in province)
Winds of Magic cost: -10% for all spells

skillTree.localised_description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
It is never enough. The food, the drink, the slaughter. It is never, ever enough.
Item defiled through dark rituals deep within the forests.

effects.description:
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
	(accompanying Lord)

Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
	(accompanying Lord)

Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +20%
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: Sometimes it's possible to bend time.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +2
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +4
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8

skillTree.localised_description: Drain the power of your enemies and crush them.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: -10
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy miscast base chance: +10%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Drain the winds of magic before the enemy can turn them against us.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: -5
	(enemy armies in region)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Practiced in the art of casting; always with a spell at the ready.
Your life is balanced on the edge of a knife when drawing from the winds. Too swift, and the winds will claim your life. Too slow, and the enemy will.

effects.description:
Miscast base chance: -1%
	(own characters in region)

Miscast base chance: -2%
	(own characters in region)

Miscast base chance: -4%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: He who casts the first spell draws first blood.

Winds of Magic power reserve: -2 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

Winds of Magic power reserve: -4 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

Winds of Magic power reserve: -6 per turn

skillTree.localised_description: With the right amount of preparation, everything can harnessed to empower even the soldier’s mundane weapons.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +1% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

Weapon strength: +2% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

Weapon strength: +3% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: So great is this one’s raw power that the winds gust in unison.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +2 per turn
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Chaos Undivided corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Chaos Undivided corruption is increased by an additional 4
Spread Corruption action: Chaos Undivided corruption is increased by an additional 6

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 15% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 30% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.
